Articles.Content:
EHMEGERSH!!!!!

*checks off KSP of mutliplayer-wishlist*

Hmmm, next up Don't Starve

But until then, EHMEGERSH!!!!!!!

got a server crash.

One of the users (Nick) seems to be crashing the server whenever he enters it

(p.s. link github pls, lost the link)

GitHub issue tracker

I get an error when I press H in the command prompt for the server: Error starting http server: System.Net.HTTPListenerException:The process cannot access the file because it is being used in another process

at System.Net.HttpListener.AddAll()

at System.Net.HttpListener.Start()

at KMPServer.Server.hostingLoop()

?? I'm not using KSP, or using anything... no process KSP. I also copied over the .dll files from a fresh KSP install.
Man say me that I am dreaming in the name of sir Isaac Newton this adds real multiplayer in ksp???

Man say me that I am dreaming in the name of sir Isaac Newton this adds real multiplayer in ksp???

Yes it adds! Go ahead and check it out !

I get an error when I press H in the command prompt for the server: Error starting http server: System.Net.HTTPListenerException:The process cannot access the file because it is being used in another process

at System.Net.HttpListener.AddAll()

at System.Net.HttpListener.Start()

at KMPServer.Server.hostingLoop()

?? I'm not using KSP, or using anything... no process KSP. I also copied over the .dll files from a fresh KSP install.

This is a common issue with some other app having grabbed port 80 before KMP can (most commonly due to Skype so far)--change your httpPort to something else and you should be good to go.

Just saying for the one of you, who dont believe:

I tested the game, I met someone on Kerbal, he stole my plane (and it was private -.-) and I died.

TehGimp666, thanks for creating this amazing mod. If the disconnects will be fixed, then...

But for now: Played 30-40 minutes, no crash and only disconnects and desyncs.
I don't know ho much i can thank you.

Where is all the servers?

And I need a ksp mod launcher/enabler/disabler because I don't wanna remove my KW Rocketry from KSP just to play multiplayer, but how can people from other connections connect to my server, using the external ip, but when i create a terraria server they can't connect.
You were right! It was skype that was taking the port, the mod creator should take this into account, like port 1337 (Because of how awesome the mod is) Isn't taken.

Just saying for the one of you, who dont believe:

I tested the game, I met someone on Kerbal, he stole my plane (and it was private -.-) and I died.

TehGimp666, thanks for creating this amazing mod. If the disconnects will be fixed, then...

But for now: Played 30-40 minutes, no crash and only disconnects and desyncs.

Getting there bit-by-bit! Let me know if you're able to reproduce that privacy bug--haven't seen one of those myself since several weeks ago.

You were right! It was skype that was taking the port, the mod creator should take this into account, like port 1337 (Because of how awesome the mod is) Isn't taken.

Don't worry, I'll be changing the default in a future release--just been busy putting out bigger fires so far than an issue that has a good workaround.

Getting there bit-by-bit! Let me know if you're able to reproduce that privacy bug--haven't seen one of those myself since several weeks ago.

This. Changes. Everything.
